title: Internet work fine but in game wouldn't after a jinx walks into lane
body:
So what happened is that jinx took smite and flash going to troll on the other team. Their team said report her ok seem regular troll but after 3 mins with bard and a zha in the bot lane jinx walk in. First nami dc and dies with me to ok must have been her internet. After she reconnects im walking into lane and then i dc. I go on youtube to see if my internet is working it opens up ok? So i wait a few minutes disconnect reconnect disconnect reconnect couldnt get back in exit my game comes back in nothing works I also have haste so i took a test during the game and took a screen shot everything looked normal. [](https://imgur.com/a/JiVau) it felt like i was getting ddosed.
https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Nicholas1209 for the game

replies.body: It sounds like your network might have just been having a hard time keeping it's connection with that game server. It's not entirely uncommon to be able to reach some servers and not be able to connect to others, the internet can be pretty weird sometimes. Let's make sure to cover all of our bases by going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but definitely hit me back up if that's not helping!
